Photo gallery WET plugin

Example

Code

<div id="cdn-gallery">
</div>
<!-- Write closure template -->
<script type="text/javascript">
	var gallery = document.getElementById("cdn-gallery");
	gallery.outerHTML = wet.plugins.gallery({
		title: "Image gallery",
		images: [{
			src: "../demos/lightbox/demo/1_s.jpg",
			href: "../demos/lightbox/demo/1_b.jpg",
			alt: "Image 1"
		},{
			src: "../demos/lightbox/demo/2_s.jpg",
			href: "../demos/lightbox/demo/2_b.jpg",
			alt: "Image 2",
			longdesc: "image2-desc"
		},{
			src: "../demos/lightbox/demo/3_s.jpg",
			href: "../demos/lightbox/demo/3_b.jpg",
			alt: "Image 3"
		},{
			src: "../demos/lightbox/demo/4_s.jpg",
			href: "../demos/lightbox/demo/4_b.jpg",
			alt: "Image 4"
		},{
			src: "../demos/lightbox/demo/5_s.jpg",
			href: "../demos/lightbox/demo/5_b.jpg",
			alt: "Image 5"
		}]
	});
</script>

Parameters

Parameter Role Mandatory
title Title of the photo gallery Yes
src Path to the thumbnail picture Yes
href Path to the original picture (big) Yes
alt Alt tag and caption of the picture Yes
longdesc If the image needs a long description No
